title: Download Patch Speed 0 kb/s
body:
Hello,

When I begin my download of the new patch it slows it 0 kb/s. I'm on the NBN and this is unusual, is anyone else having patch problems?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is this still occurring?

Could you run the [Hextech Toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi) for me (As Administrator) with the following settings.

http://puu.sh/nm3o5/4394733781.jpg

Once it has completed please send an email to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com** with the generated logs (Located on your desktop).
